alt: Bloodied battlefield scene with two lifeless bodies and the player preparing for action in a hostile area, holding a gun.
A character rides a motorcycle down a rain-soaked road at night, with a van approaching in the incoming lane.
A character rides a motorcycle on a rain-soaked road at night.
Two bloodied, lifeless bodies lie on the ground as a person aims and fires a gun at them.

Multiple glowing, holographic koi fish float through the air among illuminated lanterns, lighting up the busy streets of a futuristic city.

A blue glowing pyramid emits a vertical yellow light beam in a dark, digital setting.
A blue-glowning pyramid emits a vertical yellow light beam in the middle of a dark, digital setting, with a character standing inside the beam.
A character wearing a vest stands beside a yellow vertical beam in a dark setting, with a dialogue about betrayal at the bottom of the screen.
A character sitting with one leg on the table, holding an object, in a dark setting with a yellow beam of light in the background.
.A car on a lift at a repair station with automated laser systems performing multiple repairs.
At sunset, a rally car races down a wet road, its headlights flashing brightly.

A bell hangs from a pole as sunlight streams through the trees in a misty, swampy forest.
Meadow with wildflowers and greenery, adjacent to a pond. Clear blue sky above, surrounded by trees and chirping birds.

Two male characters stand on a dock in the rain, overlooking a lake with a rainbow.

Two male characters, one with long hair and the other wearing a cowboy hat, sit on a vehicle in front of the Bank of Rhodes during the daytime.
A rider on horseback moves through a forest as sunlight streams through the trees.

A male character with long hair and a beard holds a cigarette in his mouth and a match with fire in his hand.
A male character with long hair and a beard smokes a cigarette while standing in a forest at night.
A male character fires a revolver, the muzzle flash illuminating the darkness around him.
A male character fires a revolver upward at night, the muzzle flash illuminating his figure and the surrounding forest.
A male character stands by a calm river with a rifle, a horse nearby, and hills in the background.
A male character on horseback holding a lantern amidst falling snow in a dark forest on a snowy night.
A male character firing a mounted machine gun inside a rustic barn, with sunlight streaming through the wooden walls.
A male character wearing a raccoon hat and bandolier, standing in a sunlit forest.

A male character in fox headgear holds two revolvers inside a dark room.

A bald man with a beard stands by a stone wall. Sunlight shines through a metal railing above, and ferns grow from cracks in the wall.
A character holds a white paper with a drawing of a nude female character above a railway track, with a map displayed in the bottom left corner.

A bell hangs from a pole as sunlight streams through the trees in a misty, swampy forest.
A dimly lit mansion foyer with twin staircases, marble columns, and a central chandelier.
A rugged, bearded character in a coat sits beside a female character in a checkered dress.
A rugged, bearded character in a coat sits in front, while a female character in a checkered dress sits behind him on a street in front of a building.
